verbs.description: [ARG0: US President Donald Trump] [V: served] [ARG1: as a punching bag] [ARGM-LOC: in a late Sunday debate among the four leading contenders in Mexico 's July 1 presidential election] .
US President Donald Trump served as a [V: punching] [ARG0: bag] in a late Sunday debate among the four leading contenders in Mexico 's July 1 presidential election .
